findings.rationale: The five-year limit on the NDA may not be sufficient for long-term protection of sensitive information, especially in rapidly evolving industries.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may expose a party to undue risk, as it can lead to legal actions without sufficient financial safeguards.
findings.evidence_quote: The Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: The restriction on assignment without consent may limit the parties' ability to transfer rights or obligations, potentially complicating future business arrangements.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
